description: Try our easy to follow Ricotta Pancakes With Grilled Plums recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.

name: Ricotta Pancakes With Grilled Plums Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine flour, caster sugar, bicarbonate of soda and cinnamon in a bowl. In a jug, whisk ricotta, milk, egg and half the butter and slowly add to flour mixture, whisking until smooth and well combined.

Preheat grill on high. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Reserve 4 plum halves and arrange remainder on tray. Drizzle maple syrup over plums and sprinkle with brown sugar. Grill for 8 minutes or until softened and golden. Thinly slice reserved plums.

Meanwhile, heat a non-stick frying pan over medium heat. Brush pan with a little remaining butter. Add 1/4 cups of pancake mixture, two at a time, to pan and cook for 3 minutes or until bubbles form on the surface. Add 2 plum slices to each pancake, then turn and cook for 1-2 minutes or until cooked through. Repeat with remaining butter, pancake mixture and plum slices to make a total of 12 pancakes. Serve pancakes with grilled plums and cooking liquid.
